original_text: The Lord will establish you as his holy people, as he promised you on oath, if you keep the commands of the Lord your God and walk in obedience to him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 맹세하신 대로 너를 세워 자기의 성민이 되게 하시리니 이는 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 명령을 지켜 그 길로 행할 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will establish you as his holy people
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너를 자신의 거룩한 백성으로 세우실 것이다

sentences.original_text: as he promised you on oath
if you keep the commands of the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 주 너의 하나님의 계명들을 지키면

sentences.original_text: and walk in obedience to him
